name: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - Registry
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32)
author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)

detection.query: selection: {"TargetObject|endswith": "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\AppCompatFlags\\Compatibility Assistant\\Store\\C:\\Program Files\\Windows Media Player\\osk.exe", "Details": "Binary Data"}
